name: Soulja Car Rush
description:
Soulja Car Rush is a Simple & very challenging endless game.

Features-
~~~~~~~
- Tap on the screen to move.
- Make high scores.
- Share the scores on social network.
- Run through iconic locations.

If you enjoy endless game, you will definitely love this game.

Having any problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at support at - contact@digitalhole.co
